title: Under the Watching Eye (1C281)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Search. To play, exert a [Sauron] tracker. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion.
Lore:	What the Lidless Eye of Sauron does not see, his countless minions observe and report.
Rarity:	C
